alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:54AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Fond du Lac and Sheboygan Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 154 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cleveland to near Cedar Grove. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheboygan, Plymouth, Sheboygan Falls, Howards Grove, Oostburg, Kohler, Cedar Grove, Campbellsport, Random Lake, Elkhart Lake, Greenbush, Cascade, Adell, Waldo, St. Cloud, Glenbeulah, Haven, Beechwood, Johnsonville, and Waucousta. This includes Interstate 43 between mile markers 111 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
